1.text: • This is a Chinese festival. It marks the end of the Chinese New Year. On this day, children go out and carry paper lanterns. They solve riddles on lanterns.
1.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>This is a Chinese festival. It marks the end of the Chinese New Year. On this day, children go out and carry paper lanterns. They solve riddles on lanterns.</prosody></speak>

2.text: • People celebrate it on 1st of May. It's a public holiday. It's a celebration of the working people. There are celebrations in many countries.
2.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>People celebrate it on 1st of May. It's a public holiday. It's a celebration of the working people. There are celebrations in many countries.</prosody></speak>

3.text: • We celebrate Halloween on 31st of October. It's a fun holiday for children. On that day, children dress up in costumes. They go from door to door asking for treats.
3.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We celebrate Halloween on 31st of October. It's a fun holiday for children. On that day, children dress up in costumes. They go from door to door asking for treats.</prosody></speak>

4.text: • People all over the world celebrate it on the 1st of January. At midnight, there are fireworks. We wish our friends and family a happy new year.
4.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>People all over the world celebrate it on the 1st of January. At midnight, there are fireworks. We wish our friends and family a happy new year.</prosody></speak>

5.text: • We celebrate Independence Day on 4th of February. Sri Lanka gained independence on this day. It's a national holiday. People celebrate it all over the country. There are ceremonies, dances, parades and cultural events.
5.ssml: <speak><prosody rate='slow'>We celebrate Independence Day on 4th of February. Sri Lanka gained independence on this day. It's a national holiday. People celebrate it all over the country. There are ceremonies, dances, parades and cultural events.</prosody></speak>
